languages.text: "Наш гобелен вышел необычным, элантах. Непохожим на те, что я ткала с сородичами. Пусть и не до конца, но ты уловил{mf||а} идею, и в нашей мелодии я на короткое время обрела покой". {n}Эльдарка замолкает, удивленная собственными словами.{/n} "А теперь мне пора. Ты тоже отдохни телом и духом".

"We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."
languages.original_text: "Наш гобелен вышел необычным, элантах. Непохожим на те, что я ткала с сородичами. Пусть и не до конца, но ты уловил{mf||а} идею, и в нашей мелодии я на короткое время обрела покой". {n}Эльдарка замолкает, удивленная собственными словами.{/n} "А теперь мне пора. Ты тоже отдохни телом и духом".

traits.locale_text: "Ours was an unusual tapestry, elantach. Not like the ones I wove with my kin. Your understanding may have been nascent, but you did understand, and in our brief melody, I found calm." {n}She pauses, seemingly surprised by her own words.{/n} "I must leave. You too should rest your body and spirit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ours was an unusual tapestry, elantach. Not like the ones I wove with my kin. May you find rest in body and spirit."

languages.text: « C'est une étrange tapisserie que nous avons créée ensemble, elantach. Elle est bien différente de celles que j'ai pu tisser avec mes semblables. Vous manquez d'expérience, mais vous comprenez le but de ce chant et m'avez permis de trouver la paix dans cette brève mélodie, » {n}déclare Yrliet sur un ton presque étonné, puis elle se tait un instant.{/n} « Je vais devoir me retirer. Puissent votre corps et votre esprit trouver le repos. »
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une étrange tapisserie que nous avons créée ensemble, elantach. Elle est bien différente de celles que j'ai pu tisser avec mes semblables. Vous manquez d'expérience, mais vous comprenez le but de ce chant et m'avez permis de trouver la paix dans cette brève mélodie, » {n}déclare Yrliet sur un ton presque étonné, puis elle se tait un instant.{/n} « Je vais devoir me retirer. Puissent votre corps et votre esprit trouver le repos. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Hemos creado un tapiz inusual junt{mf|o|a}s, elantach. No se parece a ningún otro que haya tejido con los míos. No tienes experiencia, pero entiendes el propósito de este tejido, y, en nuestra breve melodía, he encontrado la paz». {n}Yrliet parece casi sorprendida, y guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Ahora debo marcharme. Espero que encuentres el descanso físico y espiritual».
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos creado un tapiz inusual junt{mf|o|a}s, elantach. No se parece a ningún otro que haya tejido con los míos. No tienes experiencia, pero entiendes el propósito de este tejido, y, en nuestra breve melodía, he encontrado la paz». {n}Yrliet parece casi sorprendida, y guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Ahora debo marcharme. Espero que encuentres el descanso físico y espiritual».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们一起创作出了不同寻常的和声，外界人，这与我和我的族人编织的和声截然不同。虽然你缺乏经验，但你很清楚和声的目的，在这场短暂的旋律之中，我得到了安宁。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音听起来几乎有些惊讶，随后，她沉默了片刻。{/n}“我得离开了，愿你的身心都能得到歇息。”
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."

traits.locale_text: “我们一起创作出了不同寻常的和声，外界人，这与我和我的族人编织的和声截然不同。虽然你缺乏经验，但你很清楚和声的目的，在这场短暂的旋律之中，我得到了安宁。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音听起来几乎有些惊讶，随后，她沉默了片刻。{/n}“我得离开了，愿你的身心都能得到歇息。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、私たちは一緒に珍しいタペストリーを作った。私がこれまで親族と織ってきたものとは違う。あなたには経験がないが、織物の目的は理解している」 {n}ユリエットは驚いたような声を上げ、しばらく黙り込んだ。 {/n}「私はもう行かなければならない。あなたが心身ともに休息を得られますように」
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私たちは一緒に珍しいタペストリーを作った。私がこれまで親族と織ってきたものとは違う。あなたには経験がないが、織物の目的は理解している」 {n}ユリエットは驚いたような声を上げ、しばらく黙り込んだ。 {/n}「私はもう行かなければならない。あなたが心身ともに休息を得られますように」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben einen ungewöhnlichen Gobelin zusammen erschaffen, Elantach. Anders als jeder, den ich je mit meiner Verwandtschaft gewebt habe. Euch fehlt es an Erfahrung, doch Ihr versteht den Zweck des Webens, und in unserer kurzen Melodie habe ich Frieden gefunden." {n}Yrliet klingt fast überrascht und verstummt einen Augenblick.{/n} "Ich muss jetzt gehen. Möget Ihr Erholung für Körper und Geist finden."
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben einen ungewöhnlichen Gobelin zusammen erschaffen, Elantach. Anders als jeder, den ich je mit meiner Verwandtschaft gewebt habe. Euch fehlt es an Erfahrung, doch Ihr versteht den Zweck des Webens, und in unserer kurzen Melodie habe ich Frieden gefunden." {n}Yrliet klingt fast überrascht und verstummt einen Augenblick.{/n} "Ich muss jetzt gehen. Möget Ihr Erholung für Körper und Geist finden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Birlikte sıra dışı bir halı dokuduk elantach. Soydaşlarımla dokuduklarıma hiç benzemiyor. Deneyimden yoksunsun ama dokumanın amacını anlıyorsun. Bu kısa melodimizde huzur buldum." {n}Yrliet, neredeyse şaşırmış gibi görünüp bir süre sessizleşiyor.{/n} "Şimdi gitmeliyim. Umuyorum bedenen ve ruhen dinlenirsin."
languages.original_text: "We created an unusual tapestry together, elantach. It is unlike any I have woven with my kin. You lack experience, but you understand the purpose of the weave, and in our brief melody, I found peace." {n}Yrliet sounds almost surprised, and she falls silent for a moment.{/n} "I must leave now. May you find rest in body and spirit."
